name: White Lavender (demo)
description:
• 6 cool characters to talk & interact with, some may even need your help! 🐞
  • Controller support 🎮
  • A soundtrack featuring 20 original tracks 🎵

As this is a demo version, some mechanics or content might not function as intended. If you come across any problems or have any suggestions, feel free to join the Sokpop Discord: https://discord.gg/invite/Ye3HrWW

The game can be played with mouse & keyboard, but for now controller might be best!

Made for the Sokpop Patreon
